message: ...We're here again? In that forest from Mink's past?!
How...
I already used Scrap...
It's not over.
I'm still inside Mink's head.
My Scrap attempt... failed...
The flames dye Mink's body red. His hair is blowing in the hot wind, and his hands are on my cheeks.

name: ミンク
message: "I don't know if we can make it through this together."

name: ミンク
message: "So I'm just gonna take the most important part of you with me."
Mink's eyes seem to be looking right through me.
I can see the flames reflected in them.
Suddenly overcome with dread, I try to get away.
But he grabs me by the neck with both hands.

name: ミンク
message: "The most sacred part of the human body... is the head."

name: ミンク
message: "It's the part that houses the soul. Protect the head and demons can't steal the soul within."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What are you... talking about..."

name: ミンク
message: "You carry the same smell as me."

name: ミンク
message: "The shadow of death... the destruction of life..."

name: ミンク
message: "It's right that you should be here at the end."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Mink... Hey!"
I have to get away!
Scrap failed. All because I changed the past.
Because I saved those people who should have died.
The past is the past. No one can change it.
An interloper like me... should never have intervened.

name: ミンク
message: "I'll bring you with me. Your... soul."
Mink embraces me tightly.

name: 蒼葉
message: "No! Mink! Let go! Let go of me...!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Mink...!"
